DOC.brief_summary: `` Fit Delivery '' randomize , control study examine effect intervention pregnancy consist exercise group nutritional counselling . We intend study 600 woman expect first child , include study time first appointment local healthcare clinic , 12 20 week pregnancy . All woman wish participate sign inform consent . Women randomly assign intervention group receive two telephone consultation nutritional advice healthy eating pregnancy . They also counsel appropriate weight gain pregnancy give pre-pregnancy body mass index . They assign exercise group meet twice week specially design workout , encourage exercise twice weekly . Women intervention group also access password-protected internet site information healthy living pregnancy , invite 2 3 evening class nutritional information . Women randomly assign control group receive routine pregnancy care . All woman study study use : - questionaires - two ultrasound examination ( 30 36 week pregnancy ) , - blood test , include 2 hour glucose challenge test , measurement hormone regulate blood glucose level - weigh participant , include use bioimpedance scale - weigh measure newborn baby , - blood test umbilical cord , measure hormone regulate blood glucose level - review hospital record regard mode delivery , delivery complication possible neonatal admission newborn child . Our hypothesis intervention form nutritional information exercise group : 1 . Affect amount weight woman gain pregnancy , amount weight retain 12 month delivery 2 . Affect percentage newborn birthweight 4 kilo , birthweight 90th percentile Norwegian newborn . 3 . Affect blood sugar level incidence gestational diabetes . 4 . Affect incidence operative delivery delivery Cesarean section . 5 . Affect serum concentration hormone regulate blood sugar level , measure participant newborn .
DOC.brief_title: Fit For Delivery : A Study Effect Exercise Sessions Nutritional Counselling Pregnancy Outcome
